original_title: 世界が静寂だったらいい
overview: Still, life has meaning.  A university student with the unusual name of Takanashi (小鳥遊). He has always been a soft-spoken person, but when he is strongly criticised by others, he has a strange disease that causes him to suddenly fall asleep. Today, he works part-time as a road construction worker, causing trouble, but he falls in love at first sight with a rollerblader who passes by. He is happy to see her again by chance, but in a strange turn of events, he is misunderstood and falls asleep. When he wakes up, he sets off to express his feelings. At the same time, she also starts running to find him...  A sensitive and timid young man steps out into the outside world for the first time. Regardless of the outcome, the preciousness of the act itself is lightly conveyed in a spare, lean film.
title: 世界が静寂だったらいい
